## Data
```{r}
#| eval: false
#| echo: true
#| warning: false
## Packages
library(dplyr)
library(MASS)

## Data
MASS::quine %>%
  dplyr::rename_with(toupper)
```

## R
```{r}
#| eval: false
#| echo: true
#| warning: false
# Packages
library(tidyverse)
library(MASS)

# Data
data <- MASS::quine %>%
  dplyr::rename_with(toupper)

# Model
nbr_fit <- MASS::glm.nb(DAYS ~ SEX + ETH, data = data)

## Coefficients
broom::tidy(nbr_fit, conf.int = TRUE, conf.level = 0.95)
```

## SAS
```{SAS}
proc genmod data = data;
  class SEX ETH;
  model DAYS = SEX ETH /
	noint dist = negbin
	alpha = 0.05;
  ods output ParameterEstimates = EST;
run;
```
